snippet.title: Stream Defense Announcement Trailer - Archon Made a Game
snippet.description:
JOIN THE DISCORD COMMUNITY:
https://www.streamdefense.com/discord

WISHLIST THE GAME ON STEAM:
https://www.streamdefense.com/steam

SIGN UP FOR THE ALPHA
https://www.streamdefense.com/alpha

FOLLOW ME ON TWITTER:
https://www.streamdefense.com/twitter

Stream Defense is a class-based tower defense game which challenges you and your Twitch viewers to work together. In Stream Defense, your viewers can play alongside you by typing commands into chat. Each viewer has full control over their character. Your viewers can even continue playing while you sleep!
